description: Selects all elements.
Selects an element by ID.
Selects all elements with a specific class.
Selects all instances of a specified element.
Selects multiple elements.
Selects direct child elements.
Selects the next sibling element.
Selects all siblings of an element.
Selects an element when hovered over.
Selects the nth child element.
Selects the first child of an element.
Selects the last child of an element.
Adds content before an element.
Adds content after an element.
Sets the margin (outside space) of an element.
Sets the padding (inside space) of an element.
Sets the border of an element.
Sets the width of an element.
Sets the height of an element.
Defines how the width and height of elements are calculated (default or including padding and border).
Specifies the display behavior of an element (block, inline, none).
Specifies the positioning method (absolute, relative, fixed, sticky).
Specifies the top position of an element.
Specifies the bottom position of an element.
Specifies the left position of an element.
Specifies the right position of an element.
Specifies whether to float an element (left, right).
Specifies whether an element can float next to other floated elements.
Defines the font family of text.
Defines the size of the font.
Sets the weight (boldness) of text.
Sets the line height of text.
Aligns text (left, center, right, justify).
Adds decoration to text (underline, overline, etc.).
Controls the capitalization of text.
Sets the spacing between characters.
Defines the color of text.
Sets the background color of an element.
Sets a background image for an element.
Defines if/how a background image repeats.
Defines the starting position of a background image.
Specifies the size of a background image.
Defines a flex container.
Specifies the direction of the flex items.
Aligns flex items horizontally (flex-start, flex-end, center, space-between, space-around).
Aligns flex items vertically (stretch, center, baseline).
Specifies whether flex items should wrap or not.
Defines a grid container.
Defines the columns of the grid.
Defines the rows of the grid.
Specifies the gap between grid items.
Specifies the starting and ending column for a grid item.
Specifies the starting and ending row for a grid item.
Aligns a grid item within its grid area.
Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element (rotate, scale, translate).
Defines the transition between two states of an element.
Defines the keyframes for an animation.
Defines the animation (name, duration, timing-function, etc.).
Selects all elements that do not match the selector.
Selects the nth element of a specific type.
Selects an element that is the only child of its parent.
Selects elements with no children (including text nodes).
Selects an element if any descendant has focus.
Selects elements with a specified attribute.
Selects elements whose attribute value starts with "value".
Selects elements whose attribute value ends with "value".
Selects elements whose attribute value contains "value".
Selects an element with focus that is keyboard-triggered.
Specifies when the transition will start.
Specifies the speed curve of the transition (ease, linear, etc.).
Specifies the delay before an animation starts.
Specifies the number of times the animation should run.
Specifies whether the animation should reverse on alternate cycles.
Specifies how a CSS animation applies styles before or after execution.
Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.
Defines how a flex item grows relative to the rest.
Defines how a flex item shrinks relative to the rest.
Specifies the initial size of a flex item.
Specifies the order of a flex item.
Aligns a flex container's lines within when there is extra space (stretch, flex-start).
Shorthand for setting grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end, and grid-column-end.
Defines named grid areas.
Controls how auto-placed items are inserted in the grid.
Aligns grid items along the row axis.
Aligns a grid item along the column axis.
Applies a blur effect to an element.
Adjusts the brightness of an element.
Adjusts the contrast of an element.
Converts an element to grayscale.
Rotates the hue of an element's colors.
Inverts the colors of an element.
Adjusts the transparency of an element.
Adjusts the color saturation of an element.
Applies a sepia tone to an element.
Applies styles to screens above a specific width.
Applies styles to screens below a specific width.
Applies styles when printing a document.
Applies styles when in landscape orientation.
Applies styles when in portrait orientation.
Specifies the maximum width of an element.
Specifies the minimum width of an element.
Specifies the maximum height of an element.
Specifies the minimum height of an element.
Adds scrollbars if needed.
Hides overflow content.
Controls the horizontal overflow.
Controls the vertical overflow.
Clips an element to a circular shape.
Clips an element to an elliptical shape.
Clips an element to a polygonal shape.
Controls the vertical stacking order of elements.
Defines the transparency of an element.
Adjusts the anti-aliasing of fonts (auto, none).
Specifies how overflowed text is signaled (ellipsis, clip).
Adjusts space between letters.
Adjusts space between words.
Controls how words can be hyphenated (auto, manual).
Controls text capitalization (uppercase, capitalize).
Adjusts the height of lines within a text block.
Specifies which properties should transition (all, specific).
Defines keyframes for an animation sequence.
Specifies the name of the keyframe animation.
Specifies how long an animation takes to complete one cycle.
Allows an image to be used for the border of an element.
Defines the rounded corners of an element.
Specifies whether table borders are collapsed or separated.
Defines space between an outline and the border edge.
Allows content to flow around a custom shape.
Defines the margin around a shape.
Defines how much of the image is visible within the shape.
References a custom property (CSS variable).
Declares a custom property (CSS variable).
Specifies the size of implicit grid columns.
Specifies the size of implicit grid rows.
Specifies the start and end of a column.
Specifies the start and end of a row.
Defines the row layout of a grid.
Defines the column layout of a grid.
Specifies that flex items should not wrap.
Reverses the direction of wrapping flex items.
Aligns flex items along the cross axis.
Aligns flex items in the center of the flex container.
Allows mathematical expressions within CSS properties.
Sets a value within a defined range.
Returns the smallest value from a set of expressions.
Returns the largest value from a set of expressions.
Specifies the URL of an image or resource to be loaded.
Returns the value of an HTML attribute.
Inserts content before an element’s actual content.
Inserts content after an element’s actual content.
Applies styles to the first line of a block-level element.
Applies styles to the first letter of a block-level element.
Specifies a custom timing function for animations.
Automatically determines the stacking order.
The 3D layering context of positioned elements.
Applies filters to the area behind an element.
Defines the visible portion of an element.
Sets the perspective from which 3D elements are viewed.
Defines the origin for the perspective property.
Scales the background image to cover the element entirely.
Sets the background image to stay fixed during scroll.
Changes the cursor to a pointer (usually for links).
Changes the cursor to a wait symbol.
Hides the cursor.
